about_the_game:
Coffee Talk - Digital Artbook

Concept art and original artwork from Coffee Talk.

DLC Content
This DLC package contains Coffee Talk - Digital Artbook. A digital PDF artbook containing original artwork and concept art from Coffee Talk's game artists, Dio Mahesa and Hendry Roesly.

Accessing The DLC
After purchasing and downloading Coffee Talk - Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Coffee Talk and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Coffee Talk's game directory, which has the Artbook folder included in it.

Concept art and original artwork from Coffee Talk.

This DLC package contains Coffee Talk - Digital Artbook. A digital PDF artbook containing original artwork and concept art from Coffee Talk's game artists, Dio Mahesa and Hendry Roesly.

Accessing The DLC
After purchasing and downloading Coffee Talk - Artbook, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Coffee Talk and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Coffee Talk's game directory, which has the Artbook folder included in it.
